mapper.sql: id, user_id, schedule_id, order_num, order_date, ticket_num, ticket_total_price, order_seat_info, pay_type, ticket_code, is_delete, is_delete2
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, m.`name` AS movie_name, m.poster, o.order_seat_info, c.cinema_name, s.hall_name, o.order_date, o.ticket_num, o.ticket_total_price, o.ticket_code, o.pay_type, s.show_date, s.show_time FROM (SELECT * FROM pddou_order WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND is_delete2=0) o JOIN pddou_schedule s ON o.schedule_id=s.id JOIN pddou_movie m ON s.movie_id=m.id JOIN pddou_cinema c ON s.cinema_id=c.id ORDER BY o.order_date DESC

SELECT sum(ticket_total_price) FROM pddou_order WHERE DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') AND pay_type='PAID' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%m')

SELECT sum(ticket_total_price) FROM pddou_order o JOIN pddou_cinema c ON c.employee_id=#{employeeId} JOIN pddou_schedule s ON s.cinema_id=c.id WHERE o.schedule_id=s.id AND DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') AND o.pay_type='PAID' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'%m')

SELECT SUM(o.ticket_total_price) as total,m.`name` FROM pddou_order o JOIN pddou_schedule s ON o.schedule_id=s.id JOIN pddou_movie m ON m.id=s.movie_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') AND o.pay_type='PAID' GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY total

SELECT SUM(o.ticket_total_price) as total,m.`name` FROM pddou_order o JOIN pddou_cinema c ON c.employee_id=#{employeeId} JOIN pddou_schedule s ON s.cinema_id=c.id AND o.schedule_id=s.id JOIN pddou_movie m ON m.id=s.movie_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') AND o.pay_type='PAID' GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY total

SELECT SUM(o.ticket_total_price) as `value`,m.type as `name` FROM pddou_order o JOIN pddou_schedule s ON o.schedule_id=s.id JOIN pddou_movie m ON m.id=s.movie_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') AND o.pay_type='PAID' GROUP BY m.type ORDER BY `value` DESC

SELECT SUM(o.ticket_total_price) as `value`,m.type as `name` FROM pddou_order o JOIN pddou_cinema c ON c.employee_id=#{employeeId} JOIN pddou_schedule s ON c.id=s.cinema_id AND o.schedule_id=s.id JOIN pddou_movie m ON m.id=s.movie_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') AND o.pay_type='PAID' GROUP BY m.type ORDER BY `value` DESC
